005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathException;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.DocumentFunctionException;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyUriItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IStringItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IDocumentNodeItem;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
021
022import java.io.IOException;
023import java.util.List;
024
025import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
026
027public final class FnDoc {
028  private static final String NAME = "doc";
029  @NonNull
030  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
031      .name(NAME)
032      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
033      .deterministic()
034      .contextDependent()
035      .focusIndependent()
036      .argument(IArgument.builder()
037          .name("arg1")
038          .type(IStringItem.class)
039          .zeroOrOne()
040          .build())
041      .returnType(IDocumentNodeItem.class)
042      .returnOne()
043      .functionHandler(FnDoc::execute)
044      .build();
045
046  private FnDoc() {
047    // disable construction
048  }
049
050  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
051  @NonNull
052  private static ISequence<IDocumentNodeItem> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
053      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments, @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
054      IItem focus) {
055    ISequence<? extends IStringItem> arg = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
056
057    IStringItem item = arg.getFirstItem(true);
058
059    return item == null ? ISequence.empty() : ISequence.of(fnDoc(item, dynamicContext));
060  }
061
062  /**
063   * Dynamically load the document associated with the URI, and return a
064   * {@link IDocumentNodeItem} containing the result.
065   * <p>
066   * Based on the XPath 3.1
067   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-doc">fn:doc</a>
068   * function.
069   *
070   * @param documentUri
071   *          the resource to load the data from
072   * @param context
073   *          the Metapath dynamic context
074   * @return the loaded document node item
075   */
076  public static IDocumentNodeItem fnDoc(@NonNull IStringItem documentUri, @NonNull DynamicContext context) {
077    IAnyUriItem uri;
078    try {
079      uri = IAnyUriItem.cast(documentUri);
080    } catch (MetapathException ex) {
081      throw new DocumentFunctionException(DocumentFunctionException.INVALID_ARGUMENT,
082          String.format("Invalid URI argument '%s' to fn:doc or fn:doc-available.", documentUri.asString()), ex);
083    }
084
085    return fnDoc(uri, context);
086  }
087
088  /**
089   * Dynamically load the document associated with the URI, and return a
090   * {@link IDocumentNodeItem} containing the result.
091   * <p>
092   * Based on the XPath 3.1
093   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-doc">fn:doc</a>
094   * function.
095   *
096   * @param documentUri
097   *          the resource to load the data from
098   * @param context
099   *          the Metapath dynamic context
100   * @return the loaded document node item
101   */
102  public static IDocumentNodeItem fnDoc(@NonNull IAnyUriItem documentUri, @NonNull DynamicContext context) {
103    // resolve if possible
104    IAnyUriItem uri = FnResolveUri.fnResolveUri(documentUri, null, context);
105    if (!uri.isAbsolute() && !uri.isOpaque()) {
106      throw new DocumentFunctionException(DocumentFunctionException.ERROR_RETRIEVING_RESOURCE, String
107          .format("No base-uri is available in the static context to resolve the URI '%s'.", documentUri.toString()));
108    }
109
110    try {
111      return context.getDocumentLoader().loadAsNodeItem(ObjectUtils.notNull(uri.asUri()));
112    } catch (IOException ex) {
113      throw new DocumentFunctionException(DocumentFunctionException.ERROR_RETRIEVING_RESOURCE, String
114          .format("Unable to retrieve the resource identified by the URI '%s'.", documentUri.toString()), ex);
115    }
116  }
117}
